text:
e="preserve">Milton Arthur Morris AO (2 April 1924 – 27 February 2019) was an Australian politician. He was a member of New South Wales Parliament from 1956 to 1980 and New South Wales Minister for Transport from 1965 to 1975. He was born in Mayfield, New South Wales.
Morris died on 27 February 2019 in Mayfield, New South Wales from complications from a stroke at the age of 94.

annotations.surface_form: New South Wales Minister for Transport
